name: ESSAY
descr: Open question with a progress bar and stimulating text!

props.name: Show progress bar
props.descr: Set to true if you want the respondent to see a progress bar

props.name: Progress Bar Text
props.descr: Show text insite the progress bar to stimulate for further details

props.name: Minimum Ideal Length
props.descr: The minimum amount of characters to fill hte progress bar (default is 200).

props.name: Progress bar text
props.descr: The text which needs to appear insite the progress bar. If multiple texts are wanted, paste them, separated by '|' (Progress Bar Text needs to be set to true).
props.value: Please write down as much as you'd like!
